content: निर्माणं {@--1@} Measuring, meting out; यतश्चाध्वकालनिर्मार्णं <ls>P. I. 4. 31</ls> <ab>Vārt.</ab> {@--2@} Measure, reach, extent; अयमप्राप्तनिर्माणः (बालः) <ls>Rām.</ls> ‘not having reached the full measure of growth’. {@--3@} Producing, forming, making, creation, formation, manufacture; ईदृशो निर्माणभागः परिणतः <ls>U. 4.</ls> {@--4@} A creation, created thing or object, form; निर्माणमेव हि तदादरलालनीयं <ls>Māl. 9. 49.</ls> {@--5@} A shape, make, figure; शरीरनिर्माणसदृशो नन्वस्यानुभावः <ls>Mv. 1.</ls> {@--6@} Composition, work. {@--7@} A building. {@--8@} A part, portion. {@--9@} Essence, pith, marrow. {@--10@} (With Buddhists) Transformation. --णा Fitness, propriety, decorum.
